H0.text: Where was the world's tallest road bridge opened in December 2004. China

H1.text: Where was the world's tallest road bridge opened in December 2004. United States

H2.text: Where was the world's tallest road bridge opened in December 2004. Japan

H3.text: Where was the world's tallest road bridge opened in December 2004. FRANCE

A4.text: The Millau Viaduct was officially inaugurated on 14 December 2004.

A5.text: The Millau Viaduct, located in France, was the tallest road bridge in the world until late 2025.
